Job Summary

As the Financial Analyst you will work with financial and accounting principles, including budgeting, year-end accounting and financial statements.

Job Description

We are seeking a Financial Analyst Intern for CAI's Internship Experience Program (IXP) for Summer 2024! This role is full-time and remote - program runs from June 3rd - August 2nd 2024.

What You'll Do

Work with financial and accounting principles, including budgeting, year-end accounting and financial statementsWork with financial systems, such as ERPs, Bookkeeping systems, etc.Develop revenue and expenditure reportsCreate financial tables in a clean and professional manner in ExcelReview financial data to determine potential exposure or weaknesses in operations and internal controlsTrace financials to assist in auditing of recordsOrganize tasks in a logical and cohesive mannerWrite professionallyBe self-driven and have the ability to work independently with guidance from senior staffPublic speakingParticipate in HHS events throughout the internship

Required

What You'll Need

College experience in the areas of Accounting, Finance, or similarWorking knowledge of general office equipment such as printer, scanner, and PCUnderstanding of office management systems, as well as proceduresHigh proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite including Word, Excel, and PowerPointExcellent time management skillsStrong organization and attention to detailAbility to prioritize tasksStrong communicative skillsHigh-level problem-solving skillsAbility to effectively multi-task

Physical Demands

Ability to safely and successfully perform the essential job functions consistent with the ADA and other federal, state and local standards Sedentary work that involves sitting or remaining stationary most of the time with occasional need to move around the office to attend meetings, etc. Ability to conduct repetitive tasks on a computer, utilizing a mouse, keyboard, and monitor
